articles.description: The Israeli military says the man was a suspect in a raid in the West Bank, but its forces violated protocol.
articles.title: Israeli army strapped wounded Palestinian to jeep

articles.description: The Prince of Wales celebrated his 42nd birthday at the singer's Wembley gig.

articles.description: The mayor of tourist island Hydra says he will press charges against those who acted "irresponsibly" on the yacht.
articles.title: Greece wildfire: Anger after yacht fireworks spark blaze

articles.description: Nigel Farage is accused of being on the side of the Russian president by his Tory, Labour, Lib Dem and SNP rivals.

articles.description: Several people are wounded after Russia targeted Ukraine's energy network for a second time this week.
articles.title: Russia launches 'massive' overnight attack on Ukraine power grid

articles.description: The health minister orders hospitals to stock anti-venom after a wave of deadly bites in rural areas.
articles.title: Bangladesh reels from surge in snake bites

articles.title: NEET: India exam chief sacked after outcry over marks

articles.description: The Pekingese took out the spot, relegating a one-eyed pug in a wheelchair to second place.
articles.title: World's ugliest dog contest won by Wild Thang

articles.description: Jay Slater, 19, has not been heard from since Monday after going missing on the island of Tenerife.
articles.title: Jay Slater: Mum issues 'we need you home' plea to missing son

articles.description: The Supreme Court orders a retrial for Toomaj Salehi, who was convicted for supporting protesters in 2022.
articles.title: Toomaj Saleh: Supreme Court overturns rapper's death sentence
